RaidLogic.NET Virtual Private Server line is the ideal solution for clients who require the control of a dedicated server matched with the affordability and simplicity of a traditional shared hosting account. Look over our plans, standard features and customization options. You can order and customize your plan online and we'll get you set up right away. If you have any questions, please contact us by phone, e-mail or live chat.


URL: http://www.raidlogic.net


Email: sales@raidlogic.net


Phone: +1.786.220.4995


Fax: +1.786.309.3555


Livechat: http://www.raidlogic.net/support/livechat.html


=============================================================

RaidLogic.NET VPS (Virtual Private Servers) Linux - Self Managed


=============================================================


Your Virtual Private Server includes the following:


Redundant power backup.


Automated generator system.


Failed hardware replacement.


99.9% uptime guarantee.


No long term contract.
